titles.title: He's Real To Me, So Real To Me

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
He's real to me, so real to me.
My precious Lord is real to me.
My soul demands reality.
My precious Lord is real to me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
He's real in me, so real in me.
My precious Lord is real in me.
My soul has found reality.
My precious Lord is real in me.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Es real para mi, muy real para mi.
Mi precioso Jesus, es real para mi.
Mi alma demanda realidad,
Mi precioso Jesus es real para mi.
